stories.text:
Do you use an experimentation tool like LaunchDarkly and Optimizely to set up feature flags ? Although these are more suited for booleans. Well you could use number / integer feature types but you would still have to somehow track usage on platform.

Or do you roll your own custom usage tracking and feature gating logic in your code?

How do you keep things clean when you have a super complex pricing matrix? Or consistent across multiple projects / codebases?

Disclaimer: I built Limiter, an open source platform for applying feature limits to your SaaS business. I'm mostly seeking feedback, low-key wishing for users.

https://www.applimiter.com
stories.title: How do you gate feature limits in your SaaS product?
